blog.name: skamfrtranslated
blog.title: Skam France Translated
blog.description: Skam France content translated in English.(Twitter skamfr4)

summary: Basile’s Instagram post - March 28 Lyrics:  Daphné. You’ll be my dolphin and I’ll be your octopus. If you were Marseille, I...
caption:
Basile’s Instagram post - March 28

Lyrics: 
Daphné. You’ll be my dolphin and I’ll be your octopus. If you were Marseille, I wouldn’t be Paris but rather a neighboring town, like Aix-en-Provence. You will be my hen and I will be your rooster. You’ll be my egg yolk and I will be your white*. Complementary together, because complementary alone doesn’t mean much. Complementary together because you plus me is two. Complementary together.

*Note: Basile says “je serai ton blanc-bec”, a “blanc-bec” is a naïve young man, but it’s also a pun with “blanc d’oeuf” (egg white) since he talks about egg yolk before. I don’t know how to translate it because frankly I don’t even know what he means in French.

Basile’s Instagram post - March 28

summary: I just watched for the first time the scene between Isak and Sana in 4x07 and God... as an arab muslim this was the worst thing...
question: I just watched for the first time the scene between Isak and Sana in 4x07 and God... as an arab muslim this was the worst thing ever. I can’t believe this scene exist, a white boy telling Sana who is and isn’t racist like...... I really really REALLY hope they change this scene in SkamFR because I’m gonna be so sad if they make Lucas say all of this to Imane.
answer:
This is why I don’t get the people criticizing and getting outraged at remakes for not being perfect and completely unproblematic because it’s like… that doesn’t even apply to the og my dudes 😂😂

No remake is perfect, and neither is the og. That scene was all kinds of gross and I’m glad Sana shut that shit down and went in on a rant explaining all the shit she dealt with everyday. When he said ‘you can’t look for racist things in every dumb question you get’ I was like first of all this ain’t for you to be saying to her you have never experienced what she has and odds are you never will.

His dismissiveness and ignorance was realistic and so that’s the only reason I appreciate that scene, other than Sana shutting that shit down and ranting. Because people really be out there talking like that and diminishing the experiences people of color go through.

Telling them that they’re exaggerating things, that it wasn’t racism, that they should ignore or tolerate the racism, but somehow still educate the racists, that they’re just too sensitive, that it’s on them somehow (isak saying that she was too cold when she said Sara was racist) and it’s like you don’t know this, you’re a white kid telling a brown Muslim kid what is or isn’t racist and that’s not for you to decide! anyway before I go on an even longer rant Sana style-

I’m just gonna say that I hope Skam France changed it too, babe.

Honestly fuck that scene lmao I’m getting angry at it all over again

When he said ‘you can’t look for racist things in every dumb question you get’ I was like first of all this ain’t for you to be saying to her you have never experienced what she has and odds are you never will.

His dismissiveness and ignorance was realistic and so that’s the only reason I appreciate that scene, other than Sana shutting that shit down and ranting. Because people really be out there talking like that and diminishing the experiences people of color go through.

Telling them that they’re exaggerating things, that it wasn’t racism, that they should ignore or tolerate the racism, but somehow still educate the racists, that they’re just too sensitive, that it’s on them somehow (isak saying that she was too cold when she said Sara was racist) and it’s like you don’t know this, you’re a white kid telling a brown Muslim kid what is or isn’t racist and that’s not for you to decide! anyway before I go on an even longer rant Sana style-

I’m just gonna say that I hope Skam France changed it too, babe.

Honestly fuck that scene lmao I’m getting angry at it all over again

blog.name: fan-think
blog.title: Au Pays Des Rêves
blog.description: 26 - French - Dreamer - Illustrator - "Writer" - And a fan

title: Eliott season ?!
body:
I’m kind of tired to see so many people asking a season on Eliott. Because I don’t see how people can think this is even possible. A season is based on a character we don’t know anything about. Or barely. Eliott is half of Lucas’ season, we know his present love story, and his biggest issue/secret, we even had adventures on this one. Of course there’s still things to say, but we already had a character development on him an his story with Lucas.
PLUS, after Imane’s season, he’ll be out of high school so absolutely no reason to do a Skam season on him….

Whereas…. Daphné, Alexia, Basile or ARTHUR have so many things we don’t know nothing about. The less I know about a character the more I want a season on that person. Arthur for example…. he is hidden to many things. He’s always here for his friends, but never say anything about himself (except the 34yo girl but still wtf is that???).

That’s it. I just needed to express myself on this Eliott season that makes absolutely no sense to me.
